Description of incident: On November 12, 2015 at the Holiday Inn Fredrick, Fredrick Maryland, notified individuals of a data breach when names, credit card account numbers of guests of the hotel were exposed to theft. The hotel does not say specifically how the information was stolen.More Information: https://www.oag.state.md.us/idtheft/Breach%20Notices/2015/itu-262351.pdf
